mapper.select: select nsa.id,nsa.plan_id,nsa.objective_id,nsa.mode_id,nsa.score,nsa.student_id from nmt_student_achievement nsa left join nmt_class_student mcs on mcs.id = nsa.student_id where mcs.class_id = #{classId} and nsa.deleted = 0 and mcs.deleted = 0 order by mcs.number

select nsa.id,nsa.plan_id,nsa.objective_id,nsa.mode_id,nsa.score, mcs.id as student_id,mcs.name as student_name,mcs.number as student_number from nmt_class_student mcs left join nmt_student_achievement nsa on mcs.id = nsa.student_id where mcs.class_id = #{classId} and mcs.deleted = 0 order by mcs.number
